title: Today’s How do we know: the man’s bones were not broken
post: Our nose is made of cartilage, not bone, right? So a broken nose is not a broken bone. How’s that for trivial? :)

title: Today’s How do we know: the man’s bones were not broken
post: According to Dr. Petrus Soons and other medical experts such as radiologists and doctors I have personally spoken to who have come to our museum from the local hospital, there are absolutely no broken bones on the body, contrary to some who claim so.  The cartilage is separated from the bone in the nose, not broken.
author: Andy Weiss

title: Today’s How do we know: the man’s bones were not broken
post:
Broken nose :
A broken nose is painfull, swollen, red.

It is a very common injury and may have very mild symptoms.
I hardly see how one can discard a broken nose with no physical exam. Nasal bone may be broken, or not.
